element.name: moveToFirstPageDisabled
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the first page'] span[class^='navButton-icon_disabled-']

element.name: moveToPreviousPageDisabled
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the previous page'] span[class^='navButton-icon_disabled-']

element.name: moveToFirstPage
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the first page'] span[class^='navButton-icon-']

element.name: moveToPreviousPage
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the previous page'] span[class^='navButton-icon-']

element.name: moveToNextPageDisabled
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the next page'] span[class^='navButton-icon_disabled-']

element.name: moveToLastPageDisabled
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the last page'] span[class^='navButton-icon_disabled-']

element.name: moveToNextPage
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the next page'] span[class^='navButton-icon-']

element.name: moveToLastPage
element.selector: button[aria-label*='move to the last page'] span[class^='navButton-icon-']
